title: Novel strategy for activating gene expression through triplex DNA formation targeting epigenetically suppressed genes
content:

Ryotaro Notomi, Shigeki Sasaki, Yosuke Taniguchi
Gene transcription is activated by forming triplex DNA on the methylated dC-containing promoter sequence of the gene whose transcription was suppressed.
